name: Here It Glows VR
description:
This a vr horror game is based in a world where everything glows. The idea came from what makes people scared of the dark, mostly about what you cant see.

This game is my college Final Major Project. Mostly made within  2 weeks due to a lot of procrastination. This is also my first game i have ever made.

I know there will some bugs and errors that i may fix in the future.

Thank you very much for looking at my game.
